overview: They say cock is a girl's best friend, but for these ladies it goes much, much deeper than that. Their unquenchable lust for the muscle of love verges on an unholy compulsion. In the face, in the ass, or in the snizz, their quest is never at an end.
tagline: They've Got A Fever And The Only Prescription Is More Cock!
title: Desperately Seeking Cock 2
